edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Grid

Class GridAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • edu.unh.cs.cs619.bulletzone.Grid.GridAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class GridAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements android.widget.ListAdapter

    GridAdapter Class!

    The GridAdapter class implements methods that use the grid, such as grabbing specific cells from the grid or creating the grid in general.
    Since:
    10/31/2018
    Author:
    Justin Moore
